text: NEW YORK, N. Y. – The way they were laughing and horsing around during interviews, you ’ d think Cobie Smulders, Fred Savage and Nicholas Stoller really were “ Friends From College. ” Instead, that ’ s the title of their new Netflix comedy, which debuted Friday. Fact is, Smulders — still best known for “ How I Met Your Mother ” despite appearing as S. H. I. E. L. D. agent Maria Hill in several incarnations of the Marvel “ Avengers ” series — never attended college. The Vancouver native registered at the University of Victoria.
